attributes.action: Gordon brown has no mandate of the british people he lied about the E.U referendum and he has let to many E.U  workers into the UK  we want an election on gordon to see if the public want him as or leader
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon brown has let us down on so much he lied about the E.U referendum he has let to many EU  workers into the country and he has no mandate we have not voted for him so unless he gives us a referendum on the E.U and an election on hiS MANDATE its time he stands down

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
